caption.p: X22 induced G 2/M phase arrest in breast and lung cancer cells. Cells were harvested after treatment with different concentrations of X22 or ribociclib for 24â€‰h. Cells were fixed by 70% ethanol and stained with propidium iodide. Data are represented as histogram on the left and the percentage of cell cycle distribution are shown on the right. The assays were performed in triplicate.
